steps.description: Talk to Cloud Skydancer and fly to Un'Goro Crater
Talk to Linken and turn in It's Dangerous to Go Alone
Talk to Cloud Skydancer or Gryfe and fly to Tanaris
Talk to Alchemist Pestlezugg and turn in Pawn Captures Queen
Talk to Alchemist Pestlezugg and accept Calm Before the Storm
Talk to Tran'rek and turn in Super Sticky
Hearth to Everlook. Buy food/water if needed
Hearth to Everlook. Buy food if needed
Talk to Felnok Steelspring and turn in Chillwind Horns
Talk to Umi Rumplesnicker and turn in Are We There, Yeti?
Talk to Ranshalla and turn in Find Ranshalla. Accept Guardians of the Altar

tips.text: Guardians of the Altar will begin an escort quest. If you're in a party ensure everyone has turned in Find Ranshalla first. Auto accept has been turned off for Guardians of the Altar

steps.description: Escort Ranshalla through Owl Wing Thicket. Click the Fire of Elune torches inside the caves when Ranshalla begins channelling her spell on them, and then the Altar of Elune at the end
Talk to Felnok Steelspring and turn in Chillwind Horns
Kill Fledgling Chillwinds, Chillwind Chimaeras and Chillwind Ravagers. Loot them for their Uncracked Chillwind Horns
Cast Teleport: Moonglade
Talk to Maethrya and fly to Moonglade
Talk to Umber and turn in Umber, Archivist. Accept Uncovering Past Secrets

tips.text: Umber may be patrolling through Nighthaven

steps.description: Talk to Rabine Saturna and turn in Uncovering Past Secrets
Talk to Rabine Saturna and turn in A Reliquary of Purity
Talk to Umber, accept Under the Chitin Was..., and turn in Under the Chitin Was...

tips.text: Umber may be patrolling through Nighthaven

steps.description: Talk to Mishellena and fly to Teldrassil
Teleport to Darnassus
Talk to Erelas Ambersky and turn in Guardians of the Altar
Talk to Erelas Ambersky and accept Wildkin of Elune
Take the purple portal into Darnassus
Talk to Gracina Spiritmight upstairs, turn in Calm Before the Storm, and accept Calm Before the Storm
Talk to Idriana and turn in Calm Before the Storm
Take the purple portal to Rut'theran Village
Talk to Erelas Ambersky and turn in Guardians of the Altar
Talk to Erelas Ambersky and accept Wildkin of Elune
Take the purple portal into Darnassus
Talk to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm and turn in Wildkin of Elune

You will now fly around to accept quests for Blackrock Depths. Blackrock Depths is a very convoluted dungeon. In order to complete all quests in the most efficient way, it is required to leave the dungeon midrun to turn in/accept follow up quests so it may all be completed in 1 run. Try to ensure all party members have the same quests and prequests complete, along with 2-3 hours of playtime
Remember to take out Black Dragonflight Molt from your bank if you completed the quest in Searing Gorge for it earlier. You will need it shortly
Travel to Ironforge
Talk to Innkeeper Firebrew. Set your Hearthstone to Ironforge

tips.text: If you have a Mage in your group you will set your Hearth to Lakeshire instead

steps.description: Talk to King Magni Bronzebeard and accept Kharan Mighthammer
Travel to Kharanos
Talk to Ragnar Thunderbrew and accept Hurley Blackbreath
Fly to Lakeshire. Set your Hearthstone to Lakeshire ONLY if you have a Mage in your group for BRD, if not skip this step and leave your Hearth in Ironforge
Fly to Burning Steppes from your nearest Flight Master
Talk to Oralius and accept The Good Stuff
Talk to Marshal Maxwell and accept Marshal Windsor

tips.text: If you cannot accept this quest complete the Dragonkin Menace quest chain

steps.description: Talk to Jalinda Sprig and accept Overmaster Pyron
Talk to Cyrus Therepentous. Select the option: 'I present you with proof of my deeds, Cyrus.' Accept A Taste of Flame and turn in A Taste of Flame

Talk to Cyrus Therepentous. If you are missing the Black Dragonflight Molt and cannot complete the quest, talk to Cyrus and select the option: 'I do not possess any proof, Cyrus.' This will spawn a level 54 Elite Dragon at the entrance of the small cave. Ensure you have party members with you to help kill it, then loot it for the Black Dragonflight Molt. Select the option after: 'I present you with proof of my deeds, Cyrus.' Accept A Taste of Flame and turn in A Taste of Flame
Talk to Cyrus Therepentous and accept A Taste of Flame
Talk to Maxwort Uberglint and accept The Heart of the Mountain
Talk to Yuka Screwspigot and accept Ribbly Screwspigot

Die intentionally in the lava in Blackrock Mountain, ideally near the Molten Core entrance location. For this step you must be a Ghost to talk to Franclorn Forgewright inside Blackrock Mountain. Resurrect at your corpse once you have the quest
Talk to Franclorn Forgewright, accept Dark Iron Legacy, turn in Dark Iron Legacy, and accept Dark Iron Legacy
Talk to Lothos Riftwaker and accept Attunement to the Core
Kill Overmaster Pyron

tips.text: Overmaster Pyron patrols outside of the BRD instance portal

steps.description: Enter Blackrock Depths
Talk to Kharan Mighthammer and turn in Kharan Mighthammer. Accept Kharan's Tale

tips.text: If your group does not have a Rogue you may need to kill High Interrogator Gerstahn for the Prison Cell Key to open the doors

steps.description: Talk to Kharan Mighthammer. Listen to Kharan's Tale
Talk to Kharan Mighthammer, turn in Kharan's Tale, and accept The Bearer of Bad News
Talk to Marshal Windsor, turn in Marshal Windsor, and accept Abandoned Hope

tips.text: If your group does not have a Rogue you may need to kill High Interrogator Gerstahn for the Prison Cell Key to open the doors

steps.description: Hearth to Ironforge if your Hearth was set there. If you have a Mage in group, kindly ask them for a portal to Ironforge
Talk to King Magni Bronzebeard, turn in The Bearer of Bad News, and accept The Fate of the Kingdom
Hearth to Lakeshire if your Hearth is set there. Otherwise fly to Burning Steppes manually. Fly to Burning Steppes
Talk to Oralius and turn in The Good Stuff
Talk to Marshal Maxwell and turn in Abandoned Hope

tips.text: The quest chain will stop here until you find A Crumpled Up Note at BRD

steps.description: Talk to Jalinda Sprig, turn in Overmaster Pyron, and accept Incendius!
Enter Blackrock Depths
Complete the Ring of Law boss event, then take the exit up the tunnel and immediately turn right, crossing up over the top of the Ring of Law, making your way to the Vault
Loot The Heart of the Mountain inside of the safe wall. It takes 15 seconds for it to respawn. There is a trick which allows you to loot it without having to open the safe

tips.text: Click here to see how to loot the Heart of the Mountain

steps.description: Kill Fineous Darkvire. Loot him for the Ironfel
Kill Lord Incendius
Run back near the location above the Ring of Law. Click the Monument of Franclorn Forgewright and turn in Dark Iron Legacy
Head to the Shadowforge Gates at the start of the entrance. Kill Bael'Gar. Use the Altered Black Dragonflight Molt on his corpse
Kill Dwarves at BRD. Loot them for A Crumpled Up Note. Use A Crumpled Up Note to start the quest

tips.text: It is important you do this before killing bosses General Angerforge and Golem Lord Argelmach
If you still have not found this by now clear around the Detention Block until it drops

steps.description: Talk to Marshal Windsor, turn in A Crumpled Up Note, and accept A Shred of Hope
Kill General Angerforge and Golem Lord Argelmach. Loot them both for Marshal Windsor's Lost Information
Talk to Marshal Windsor, turn in A Shred of Hope, and accept Jail Break!

tips.text: ENSURE ALL PARTY MEMBERS HAVE AUTO ACCEPT OFF FOR THIS STEP! RestedXP HAS AUTO ACCEPT OFF FOR THIS STEP
Accepting this quest will begin the Jail Break escort. Ensure you have cleared all of the Detention Block area for an easier time escorting Marshal Windsor

steps.description: Escort Marshal Windsor through BRD

Enter the Bar and go into the small room on the left. Do NOT attack any of the neutral mobs while running through the Bar. Kill Ribbly Screwspigot. Loot him for his Head. To engage Ribbly Screwspigot have your tank talk to him, then bring him back along with his Cronies into the room with the kegs

Enter the Bar and go into the small room on the left. Do NOT attack any of the neutral mobs while running through the Bar. Click on the 3 Thunderbrew Lager Kegs to destroy them, forcing Hurley Blackbreath and his 3 Blackbreath Cronies to engage. Kill Hurley Blackbreath. Loot him for the Lost Thunderbrew Recipe
Loot the Core Fragment on the ground outside of the Molten Core instance portal
Kill Emperor Dagran Thaurissan. Have a party member kite Princess Moira Bronzebeard while the rest of the group kills Emperor Dagran Thaurissan

tips.text: You must NOT kill Princess Moira Bronzebeard in order to complete and turn in this quest

steps.description: Talk to Princess Moira Bronzebeard, turn in The Fate of the Kingdom, and accept The Princess's Surprise
Hearth to Ironforge if your Hearth was set there. If you have a Mage in group, kindly ask them for a portal to Ironforge
Talk to King Magni Bronzebeard and turn in The Princess's Surprise
Travel to Kharanos
Talk to Ragnar Thunderbrew and turn in Hurley Blackbreath
Hearth to Lakeshire if your Hearth is set there. Otherwise fly to Burning Steppes manually. Fly to Burning Steppes
Talk to Oralius and turn in The Good Stuff
Talk to Marshal Maxwell, turn in Jail Break!, and accept Stormwind Rendezvous
Talk to Jalinda Sprig and turn in Incendius!
Talk to Cyrus Therepentous and turn in A Taste of Flame
Talk to Maxwort Uberglint and turn in The Heart of the Mountain
Talk to Yuka Screwspigot and turn in Ribbly Screwspigot
Talk to Borgun Stoutarm and fly to Stormwind. Have a Mage port you if you have one in your group
Talk to Squire Rowe and Reginald Windsor at the Gates of Stormwind, turn in Stormwind Rendezvous, and accept The Great Masquerade

tips.text: Squire Rowe will call for Reginald Windsor's arrival after you talk to him at the Gates of Stormwind
IF YOU ARE IN A PARTY ENSURE NO ONE AUTO ACCEPTS The Great Masquerade. AUTO ACCEPT HAS BEEN TURNED OFF FOR THIS STEP

steps.description: Escort Reginald Windsor into Stormwind Keep. Do not assist Reginald Windsor in combat while inside the Keep. If you do so there is a high chance you may die. Stay back at the arrow location and let the event finish on its own. It will take a few minutes
Talk to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon, turn in The Great Masquerade, and accept The Dragon's Eye
Talk to Lothos Riftwaker and turn in Attunement to the Core

tips.text: You can either turn this in now or the next time you are in Blackrock Mountain

steps.description: Travel to Felwood
Talk to Sindrayl and fly to Felwood
Talk to Maethrya and fly to Felwood
Grind Furbolgs at Felpaw Village until you have enough XP to ding 60, then fly to Darnassus
Talk to Sindrayl and fly to Teldrassil
Talk to Mishellena and fly to Teldrassil
Grind Furbolgs at Felpaw Village until you have enough XP to ding 60, then Teleport to Darnassus
Teleport to Darnassus
Talk to Erelas Ambersky and turn in Guardians of the Altar
Talk to Erelas Ambersky and accept Wildkin of Elune
Take the purple portal into Darnassus
Talk to Gracina Spiritmight upstairs, turn in Calm Before the Storm, and accept Calm Before the Storm
Talk to Idriana and turn in Calm Before the Storm
Take the purple portal to Rut'theran Village
Talk to Erelas Ambersky and turn in Guardians of the Altar
Talk to Erelas Ambersky and accept Wildkin of Elune
Take the purple portal into Darnassus
Talk to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm and turn in Wildkin of Elune
Congratulations on finishing the guide !
